messages.content: Для чего предназначены объекты типа «ForceSensor» в CoppeliaSim?
Objects of type "ForceSensor" in CoppeliaSim are used for measuring the force exerted on a body or object.
Какие спектральные свойства объекта сцены CoppeliaSim Вам известны?
I am familiar with the spectral properties of objects in CoppeliaSim, but I will need more information about which properties you are referring to in order to provide a specific answer.
Какие спектральные свойства объекта сцены CoppeliaSim  известны?

Objects in CoppeliaSim can have various spectral properties, such as frequency, amplitude, phase angle, and wavelength, among others. The specific spectral properties known to you will depend on the context and requirements of your simulation.
